pages.text: A Shovel suited for gravediggers and grave robbers, the shovel breaks 2 blocks instead of one when breaking a blocks like dirt, allowing the user to dig up graves on the fly. The reason for its name is how the shovel has a 10%% chance of digging up remains when breaking blocks like dirt or sand.
The shovel can be repaired on an anvil with a $(l:intro/magical_components)Cursed Metal Ingot$().
